DOC.brief_summary: Eating diet high fat contributes development atherosclerosis ( harden artery ) . Acute fat consumption increase level fat blood temporarily reduce ability blood vessel dilate ( open carry additional blood ) . A similar response observe infusion Intra-Lipid ( fat emulsion use intravenous nutrition ) . The present study design help u understand effect fat load blood vessel function . We measure arterial dilation use non-invasive technique end 5-hour infusion Intra-Lipid healthy subject . Subjects take approve drug metformin two week return repeat study endothelial function Intra-Lipid infusion . We expect metformin help preserve normal function blood vessel fat load . This study help u understand fat affect blood vessel therefore advance knowledge development atherosclerosis potentially lead improve method prevent treat heart disease .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Pregnancy ( define positive urine pregnancy test ) Diabetes Mellitus ( Clinical history random blood glucose > 140 mg/dl ) Hypertension ( Clinical history SBP > 140 DBP > 90 mmHg ) History adverse reaction metformin Abnormal renal function ( Serum creatinine > 1.4 mg/dl ) Abnormal liver function ( AST ALT great two time upper limit normal ) Administration iodinate contrast within 7 day History congestive heart failure Abnormal clotting parameter ( INR > 1.5 PTT > 40 sec ) Anemia ( HCT < 30 % ) Allergy soy egg Allergy heparin The potential subject plan perform heavy exercise set low calorie intake period study run competitive road bicycle race
